content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide assembly instructions:

The target image shows two structures:

1. Left Structure (Bridge-like):
- Has red arches as base (2 arch blocks)
- Yellow horizontal block on top of arches
- Two green blocks vertically placed
- One blue block with an orange triangular block on top

2. Right Structure (Tower-like):
- Green blocks at top and bottom
- Red, blue, and red blocks in middle section
- Tall yellow vertical pieces on sides

Analysis of required blocks and assembly order:

For Left Structure:
{
Step1: Move block with index 1 (left red arch)
Step2: Move block with index 1 (right red arch)
Step3: Move block with index 12 (horizontal yellow block)
Step4: Move block with index 5 (left green cube)
Step5: Move block with index 5 (right green cube)
Step6: Move block with index 4 (blue cube)
Step7: Move block with index 16 (orange triangular top)
}

For Right Structure:
{
Step8: Move block with index 5 (bottom green cube)
Step9: Move block with index 13 (left yellow vertical)
Step10: Move block with index 13 (right yellow vertical)
Step11: Move block with index 6 (red cube)
Step12: Move block with index 4 (blue cube)
Step13: Move block with index 6 (red cube)
Step14: Move block with index 11 (green horizontal top)
}
